ygData.subject: Re: Just a rant, nothing important
ygData.msgSnippet: i usually do use the mouse to target the list of names on the screen...i seem to have a handicap trying to watch life bars..keep right hand on mouse for
ygData.messageBody:
i usually do use the mouse to target the list of names on the screen...i
seem to have a handicap trying to watch life bars..keep right hand on mouse
for casting and hitting my F keys to target...i spose i am not that co
ordinated.... i have lost 2 like that...and don't wanna ever lose them
again...

Sianne
29th Cleric
Xegony


>From: "Clay Armstrong" <claya@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Just a rant, nothing important
>Date: Wed, 8 Dec 1999 12:50:57 -0600
>
>You can also use F2-F6 for party members, with yourself as F1.
>
>Dweezeman Dourbough
>33rd human cleric E'Ci
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Mr. J Daniels <warpig@...>;
><sentto-200561-2474-claya=ttgsoftware.com@onelist.com>
>To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
>Sent: Wednesday, December 08, 1999 12:46 PM
>Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Just a rant, nothing important
>
>
> > From: "Mr. J Daniels" <warpig@...>
> >
> > Are you using the mouse to select the target? If so I reccomend using
> > the hotkeys for members in your group. I cant remember if I remaped
>them
> > or not but mine are on the keypad, 1-6.
> >
> >
> > On Wed, 8 Dec 1999, Sianne . wrote:
> >
> > > From: "Sianne ." <maggee1@...>
> > >
> > >
> > > i always feel like a bum when someone dies in my group..i try to let
>folks
> > > know when i am low on mana...sometimes things are so nuts you don't
>have
> > > time to say anything....but sometimes....you just lose ppl i
>suppose....let
> > > me ask this question. sometimes...say an enchanter or someone without
>alot
> > > of HP, is doing the most damage and all the baddies are on him and he
>is
> > > getting low..you go to heal him...and you fizzle a time or God forbid
> > > twice...and he is down...then you lose him as a target..you got a
>second
> > > there you can get him back up...but my targeting loses him...that
>drives
>me
> > > nuts...anyone else have that problem?
> > >
> > > >From: Chris Wheeler <wheelech@...>
> > > >Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> > > >To: "'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'" <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
> > > >Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Just a rant, nothing important
> > > >Date: Wed, 8 Dec 1999 10:47:06 -0500
> > > >
> > > >Ya, you're right. Just something in me felt guilty about leaving.
>After
> > > >all, I was the group leader, and I had invited people in to the
>group.
>But
> > > >next time, I will definately know better... famous last words...
> > > >
> > > >-----Original Message-----
> > > >From: Paul Heenan [mailto:pheenan@...]
> > > >Sent: 1999/12/08 10:49 AM
> > > >To: 'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'
> > > >Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Just a rant, nothing important
> > > >
> > > >
> > > >From: Paul Heenan <pheenan@...>
> > > >
> > > >Personally, I would have left that group...and fast. It was
>established
>in
> > > >the beginning that you had problems with teamwork (the loot thing).
>If
>I
> > > >see
> > > >that the group is not cooperating from the very start, I leave as
>quickly
> > > >as
> > > >I can. It's not worth dying over when a better group is probably 10
>ft.
> > > >away. Granted, it's not always easy to find another group, I will
>take
> > > >soloing over dying because of somebody else's stupidity. At least if
>I
>die
> > > >solo, I know it was MY fault.
> > > >
> > > >Drizben D'Vorn
> > > >Propagator of Hate
> > > >Defiled High Priest of Innoruuk
> > > >Oblivion Knight of the 30th Circle
> > > >
> > > > > From: Chris Wheeler <wheelech@...>
> > > > >
> > > > > Hi all,

> > > > > The following is just a rant. Nothing of substance, just me
>venting
> > > >about
> > > > > last nites gameplay. If you don't want to read it, feel free to
>skip.

> > > > > Brytewing, 16th Cleric of the Rathe.
